about_the_game:
The Synergist is the newest Roguelite developed by Tetryl Studios. Use your Alchemical Powers to survive being roasted by every evil diety you can think of! By mastering the elements and their combinations you'll be able to roast, freeze, shock, or just outright obliterate all your enemies! That is, assuming they don't kill you first. Throughout the game, the player will be prompted to fight the undead, pirates, ghosts, mummies, and so much more! Once you gain enough XP, you can make your individual elements stronger using the skill points you acquire, and then combine those elements to create even stronger combinations. All eight worlds are procedurally generated, allowing for endless unique worlds and boss dimensions for the player to enjoy! Be careful though, if your character dies it's permanent! Make sure you stay on your toes, Deities each have their own special attacks that could affect the player in a variety of ways...

Features
  • PermaDeath
    Play carefully! If your character dies, you'll have to start a new one!
  • Endless Alchemical Power!
    With over 23 different elemental combinations, there is no end to the variety of ways you can decimate your foes!
  • Unique Worlds
    All overworlds and underworlds are created using procedural generation, granting players access to a limitless number of unique battlefields.
  • To Specialize or Not to Specialize
    That is the question. As players make their way through the game and level up, they will have to choose how much of their power to invest into each element.
